text: Rolling Loud is a hip hop music festival. It was started in 2015 by Matt Zingler and Tariq Cherif. The first Rolling Loud took place on Feburary 28, 2015 at Soho Studios in Miami, Florida. It was headlined by Schoolboy Q, Juicy J, and A$AP Ferg. Rolling Loud events have been held in Miami (2017-present), California (2017-present), New York (2019-present), Sydney, Australia (2019), Portugal (2020-present), Toronto (2022), Rotterdam, Netherlands (2023), Munich, Germany (2023), and Pattaya, Thailand (2023). ==References== ==Other websites== *Rolling Loud website Category:2015 establishments in the United States Category:Music festivals in the United States
title: Rolling Loud
